report.name: valfactjust

dataSource.name: Q_REQ_PRINC
dataSource.select: SELECT dvf.iddem, dvf.datdem, dvf.SOCFACT, s.SOCLIB, dvf.NUMFACT, dvf.TYPFACT, dvf.DATFACT datfact, lf.lnum, to_char(dvf.ECART,'FM99999990D00') ecart, f.NUMCONT, lf.ident, r.rnom ,r.rprenom , lf.lmoisprest, lf.lcodcompta, to_char(lf.lmontht,'FM99999990D00') lmontht, to_char(sr.COUT,'FM99999990D00') cout, f.fenrcompta, f.fenvsec, f.fmodreglt, f.fordrecheq, f.fnom, f.fadresse1, f.fadresse2, f.fadresse3, f.fcodepost, f.fburdistr, dvf.faccsec, dvf.fregcompta, dvf.fstatut2, dvf.causesuspens, dvf.datstat, dvf.statut, to_char(sum(pp.cusag * pp.cout),'FM99999990D00') conso FROM ligne_fact lf, ressource r, societe s, facture f, demande_val_factu dvf, situ_ress sr, proplus pp WHERE lf.ident = r.ident AND lf.socfact = s.soccode AND f.SOCFACT = lf.SOCFACT AND f.TYPFACT = lf.TYPFACT AND f.NUMFACT = lf.NUMFACT AND f.DATFACT = lf.DATFACT AND dvf.SOCFACT = lf.SOCFACT AND dvf.TYPFACT = lf.TYPFACT AND dvf.NUMFACT = lf.NUMFACT AND dvf.DATFACT = lf.DATFACT AND dvf.LNUM = lf.LNUM AND sr.IDENT = r.IDENT AND sr.DATSITU = (select max(sr1.DATSITU) from situ_ress sr1 where sr1.IDENT = r.IDENT and sr1.DATSITU <= lf.LMOISPREST) AND (sr.DATDEP is null or sr.DATDEP > lf.LMOISPREST) AND pp.tires = lf.ident AND pp.societe = lf.socfact AND pp.cdeb = lf.lmoisprest AND ( pp.aist not in ( 'FORMAT','CONGES', 'ABSDIV','MOBILI','PARTIE', 'RTT','RTT ') OR pp.aist IS NULL ) &P_WHERE GROUP BY dvf.datdem, dvf.iddem, dvf.SOCFACT, s.SOCLIB, dvf.NUMFACT, dvf.TYPFACT, dvf.DATFACT, lf.lnum, to_char(dvf.ECART,'FM99999990D00'), f.NUMCONT, lf.ident, r.rnom ,r.rprenom , lf.lmoisprest, lf.lcodcompta, to_char(lf.lmontht,'FM99999990D00') , to_char(sr.COUT,'FM99999990D00') , f.fenrcompta, f.fenvsec, f.fmodreglt, f.fordrecheq, f.fnom, f.fadresse1, f.fadresse2, f.fadresse3, f.fcodepost, f.fburdistr, dvf.faccsec, dvf.fregcompta, dvf.fstatut2, dvf.causesuspens, dvf.datstat, dvf.statut ORDER BY dvf.numfact;

function.name: afterpform
m_valideformattrigger
m_suspensformattrigger
cf_ressourceformula
cf_societeformula
cf_statutformula
